item.title: 尼日利亚电网和机场受到冲击，工会要求举行大罢工
item.description: 周一，在工会举行大罢工之后，尼日利亚遭遇大面积停电，国家电网关闭，西非国家主要机场的服务中断。【原文：Nigeria experienced widespread power cuts on Monday after labor unions called a general strike, closing down the national grid and disrupting services at key airports in the West African nation.】

item.title: 沙特财富基金希望通过罕见的英镑债券销售来寻求现金支持
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金正在寻求利用国际债务市场出售英镑计价债券，以实现资金来源多元化，并筹集外部资金支持王国的经济改革。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is looking to tap international debt markets for a sterling-denominated bond sale as it seeks to diversify its funding sources and raise external capital to back the kingdom’s economic overhaul.】

item.title: 现金利息收入激增，英伟达引领企业 "造币 "潮流
item.description: 随着利率创下十多年来的新高，企业财务总监们发现，钱确实可以生钱。【原文：With interest rates at more than decade-highs, corporate finance chiefs are finding that money can indeed beget money.】

item.title: 伊姆兰-汗在巴基斯坦保密法案中被判无罪
item.description: 巴基斯坦一家法院暂缓执行对前总理伊姆兰-汗的十年监禁判决，原因是他在执政期间违反国家保密法，公开了一份外交电报。【原文：A Pakistani court suspended a ten year jail sentence given to former prime minister Imran Khan for violating the nation’s secrecy laws by making a diplomatic cable public when he was in power.】

item.title: 申银万国有望为伦敦带来渴望已久的大单 IPO
item.description: 在线时尚零售商 Shein 有可能在伦敦上市，这可能正是伦敦金融城期待已久的消息。【原文：Online fashion retailer Shein’s potential mega listing in London could be just the news the City has been waiting so long to hear.】

item.title: 莫迪大获全胜，阿达尼股票暴涨 200 亿美元
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的公司周一大涨，集团市值增加了近 200 亿美元，因为出口民调强烈显示总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政党在周六结束的大选中取得了决定性胜利。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani’s firms rallied on Monday, adding almost $20 billion to the group’s market value, as exit polls strongly signaled a decisive victory for Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party in the general elections that concluded Saturday.】

item.title: 比尔-阿克曼的潘兴广场公司以 10.5 亿美元出售 10%的股份
item.description: 对冲基金经理比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）在潘兴广场公司计划首次公开募股前出售了该公司 10% 的股份，交易估值超过 100 亿美元。【原文：Hedge-fund manager Bill Ackman sold a 10% stake in Pershing Square ahead of a planned initial public offering in a deal valuing the company at more than $10 billion.】

item.title: 土耳其对以色列的出口在因战争停止贸易后暴跌 99
item.description: 在雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统的政府停止贸易，直到加沙获得足够的人道主义援助之后，土耳其对以色列的出口在 5 月份几乎完全停止。【原文：Turkey’s exports to Israel all but ground to a halt in May, after President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s government stopped trade until Gaza receives enough humanitarian aid.】

item.title: 中国开发商保利酝酿出售 17 亿美元可转换债券
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，按今年的合同销售额计算，中国最大的建筑商保利开发控股集团正在考虑通过出售可转换债券筹集高达 120 亿元人民币（17 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Poly Developments and Holdings Group, China’s biggest builder by contracted sales this year, is considering raising as much as 12 billion yuan ($1.7 billion) via a convertible bond sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对热门银行风险转移交易的 "盲目 "下注从未如此受欢迎
item.description: 这可能是终极风险赌注。养老基金、保险公司和对冲基金正在承担世界各地银行倒闭贷款的第一笔损失，甚至不知道这些贷款背后借款人的身份。【原文：It might be the ultimate risky bet. Pension funds, insurers and hedge funds are taking on the first losses of loan failures of banks around the world — without even knowing the identities of the borrowers behind those loans.】

item.title: 丹麦皇冠集团首席执行官瓦勒尔将在裁员和倒闭潮中下台
item.description: 欧洲最大的猪肉生产商丹麦皇冠公司（Danish Crown A/S）的首席执行官将在整个公司因需求和畜群规模缩小而缩减规模的情况下下台。【原文：The chief executive officer of Danish Crown A/S, Europe’s largest pork producer, will step down amid a scale-back across the company as demand and herd sizes shrink.】

item.title: 交易员等待 ISM 数据提供经济线索，国债上涨
item.description: 美国制造业数据将为美联储今年的降息幅度提供最新线索，在该数据公布前，国债收益率上升，基准收益率达到近一周来的最低点。【原文：Treasuries rose to take benchmark yields to the lowest in nearly a week ahead of US manufacturing data that will provide the latest clue on how much the Federal Reserve may cut interest rates this year.】

item.title: 前挪威储蓄银行（SBB）总裁巴特尔扬领导公众宣传局恶意收购挪威竞争对手
item.description: 陷入困境的房东SBB公司创始人兼下台的首席执行官伊利亚-巴特连（Ilija Batljan）对竞争对手挪威一家房地产公司发起了恶意收购，试图加强对北欧国家房地产市场的控制。【原文：Ilija Batljan, the founder and ousted chief executive of troubled landlord SBB, has launched a hostile takeover of a rival Norwegian real estate firm as he seeks to tighten his grip on the Nordic nation’s property market.】

item.title: 私人信贷--华尔街最热门的交易--迎来丑陋时刻
item.description: 多年来，随着私人信贷爆炸式地发展成为一个价值 1.7 万亿美元的行业，市场上最大的参与者的说法是，他们的交易，简单地说，更安全。【原文：For years, as private credit exploded into a $1.7 trillion industry, the line from the market’s biggest players was that their deals were, simply put, safer.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油在地中海找到新的转换地点
item.description: 在希腊海军的压力下，俄罗斯石油贸易商在地中海找到了一个新的原油转运地，这表明要取缔这一令监管机构和欧洲各国政府都感到震惊的活动有多么困难。【原文：Under pressure from Greece’s navy, traders of Russian oil have found a new place to switch cargoes of crude in the Mediterranean sea, a sign of how hard it will be to clamp down on an activity that has alarmed regulators and European governments alike.】

item.title: 墨西哥大选获胜后比索跌幅扩大至 2
item.description: 墨西哥比索跌幅扩大，兑美元汇率下跌超过 2%，因为初步选举结果显示执政党以压倒性优势获胜，这可能使其有能力加强国家对经济的控制。【原文：Mexico’s peso extended its decline, weakening more than 2% against the dollar, as preliminary election results showed the ruling party winning in a landslide that could empower it to increase state control of the economy.】

item.title: 养老院运营商拉维护理中心申请破产
item.description: 拉维护理中心有限责任公司（LaVie Care Centers LLC）运营着 43 家养老院和辅助生活设施，包括 Consulate Health Care 等名称，该公司成为最新一家申请破产保护的连锁企业，因为该行业正努力应对高昂的劳动力成本、较低的入住率和不均衡的报销率。【原文：LaVie Care Centers LLC, which operates 43 nursing homes and assisted living facilities under names including Consulate Health Care, became the latest chain to file for Chapter 11 bankruptcy as the industry grapples with high labor costs, lower occupancy and uneven reimbursement rates.】

item.title: 大选推动新兴市场货币波动，股市反弹
item.description: 今年以来，新兴市场股票在中国经济数据利好后涨幅最大，印度、墨西哥和南非的选举结果也导致货币市场大幅波动。【原文：Emerging-market equities jumped the most this year after favorable data on the Chinese economy, with election results from India, Mexico and South Africa causing wide swings in currency markets.】

item.title: 前千年交易员梅吉亚以 50 亿美元成立自己的对冲基金
item.description: 千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）的前高级交易员迭戈-梅吉亚（Diego Megia）以 50 亿美元启动了他的新对冲基金，并在第一天就向新资金关闭了基金，成为近年来最大的初创公司之一。【原文：Millennium Management’s former senior trader Diego Megia kicked off his new hedge fund with $5 billion and closed it to new money on the very first day, becoming one of the largest startups in recent years.】

item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.摩根士丹利的同行却不这么认为。【原文：Investors betting on further US equity gains over the coming months will be disappointed, according to strategists at JPMorgan Chase & Co. Their peers at Morgan Stanley disagree.】

item.title: 法航-荷航即使称赞合并也不会重提 ITA
item.description: 法航荷航集团首席执行官本-史密斯（Ben Smith）表示，即使在德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）收购意大利航空公司ITA Airways失败的情况下，他也不太可能重新考虑这家航空公司。【原文：Air France-KLM Group Chief Executive Officer Ben Smith signaled he’s unlikely to take another look at Italian carrier ITA Airways, even if the airline comes back on the market in the event of a failed takeover bid by Deutsche Lufthansa AG.】

item.title: 时钟塔称国债面临特朗普大选 "灾难 "风险
item.description: Clocktower Group 的数据显示，如果唐纳德-特朗普领导的共和党获胜的几率继续上升，十年期国债收益率在美国大选前有接近 5%的风险。【原文：Ten-year Treasury yields are at risk of approaching 5% ahead of the US election, if the odds of a Donald Trump-led Republican victory continue to rise, according to Clocktower Group.】

item.title: 即使信贷损失飙升，Monzo 仍首次实现盈利
item.description: Monzo Bank Ltd.报告称，在去年收入翻了一番多之后，该公司首次实现了年度盈利，尽管该公司为价值超过其贷款额十分之一的不良贷款提取了准备金。【原文：Monzo Bank Ltd. reported its first annual profit after more than doubling its revenue last year, though it made provisions for bad loans worth more than a tenth of its lending book.】

item.title: 德国部长预计欧洲央行将很快降息，希望后续有更多降息举措
